para:
The Java WS Core is an implementation of the Web Services Resource Framework (WSRF) and the Web Service Notification (WSN) family of standards. It provides APIs and tools for building stateful Web services.FIXME Also provides a Java-based container (hosting environment) and is the default container for GT. Commands can be used with any WSRF-based service/resource [fixme link]. The following GT components are based on the Java WS Core FIXME verify the following:
Reliable File Transfer (RFT) WS Replica Locator Service (RLS) GRAM4 WS Java Security Community Authorization Service (CAS) Monitoring and Discovery System ( MDS4)
